name: Notification of Appointment Deletion
description: Notification sent when an appointment that was entered in error has been permanently removed from the system
businessPurpose: Remove erroneously scheduled appointments from the system to prevent statistical processing errors and maintain data integrity
timing: Sent when an appointment that was entered in error needs to be permanently removed from the schedule
realWorldScenarios: Duplicate appointment created by scheduler error - remove the duplicate
Appointment scheduled for wrong patient due to MRN mixup
Test appointment created during system training - needs permanent removal
Appointment entered with wrong service type - delete and recreate correctly
Scheduling system glitch created phantom appointments
Accidental appointment creation during demonstration or testing

generationRules.NTE: Reason for deletion often included for audit trail
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Critical - deletion must be accurate to prevent removal of valid appointments
